UI.noInput: Please answer before viewing the solution

question: Customer relationship management is accomplished by all of the following EXCEPT ________.

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Communicating with customers in a personalized way

answers.text: finding ways of improving customer satisfaction from prior customer experiences

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Finding ways of improving customer satisfaction is one way of achieving customer relationship management.

answers.text: communicating with customers in a personalized way

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: That’s not correct. Establishing and tracking customer interactions is essential to achieving customer relationship management.

answers.text: offering the lowest price of all the companies on the market

tipsAndFeedback.chosenFeedback: All the other choices are ways of achieving customer relationship management. Offering the lowest price of all companies on the market is not.

detailedSolution: All the other choices are ways of achieving customer relationship management. Offering the lowest price of all companies on the market is not.
